fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Dangerous: You have a hand size of 6 and draw 1 more card every phase. 
- Mask: Choose a role to disguise as within the first phase of the game. You will appear to win with others according to the role you chose.
- Tough Skin: You are immune to Chaos factionâ€™s Night phase attack. 
- Meticulous: You plant bombs by directly/indirectly attacking people who fail to defend (includes defenses and reforges). You will know at all times who has a bomb.  
- Annihilation: Everyone will know the start of the phase when you have no more targets to plant a bomb on. Once you have placed a bomb on everyone, you will automatically detonate *at the end of the phase*, granted you live to the end of that phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Preparations: Gain a non-special card of your choice. [4 uses, 1 CD]
- Rig: Reforge! a card. [3 uses, 1 CD] 
- Plant: Plant a bomb on a target of your choice. [2 uses, Astral] 
- Explosion: Deal 2 HP of Unblockable damage at the end of the phase to 3 non-bombed players of your choice. [1 use, Unique, Astral]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank/Outsider King.
